text: Sylvia Bassot (18 December 1940 - 3 January 2014)Sylvia Bassot, former parliamentary Orne died at the age of 73 was a member of the National Assembly of France from 1996 until 2012. She represented the Orne department, and was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians Category:Politicians from Normandy
title: Sylvia Bassot
